    • Class Blackjack extends java.awt.Container implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • BACKGROUND

          javax.swing.JLabel BACKGROUND
          Background image

        • START_INDEX

          int START_INDEX
          The pixel coordinate along the x-axis where the leftmost edge of the leftmost card will be placed

        • hit

          javax.swing.JButton hit
          The "Hit" button. Live on the edge!

        • stand

          javax.swing.JButton stand
          The "Stand" button

        • hand

          java.util.ArrayList<E> hand
          The player's hand

        • dHand

          java.util.ArrayList<E> dHand
          The dealer's hand

        • cardIndex

          int cardIndex
          The pixel to place the next player's card

        • dCardIndex

          int dCardIndex
          The pixel to place the next dealer's card

        • d

          Deck d
          The deck of cards

        • handValue

          int handValue
          The value of the player's hand

        • dHandValue

          int dHandValue
          The value of the dealer's hand

        • bet

          int bet
          The user's bet

        • betPrint

          javax.swing.JLabel betPrint
          Label displaying how much money you have in your pocket

        • onTable

          javax.swing.JLabel onTable
          Label displaying how much money you have on the table (wagered)

        • playerStatus

          javax.swing.JLabel playerStatus
          Label displaying the player's status, such as "Standing at " concatenated with Blackjack.handValue

        • dealerStatus

          javax.swing.JLabel dealerStatus
          Label displaying the player's status, such as "Standing at " concatenated with Blackjack.dHandValue

        • flipMe

          boolean flipMe
          Used to control the dealers first card being flipped initially, so it cannot be seen until after the user has played

    • Class Card extends javax.swing.JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • suit

          java.lang.String suit
          The suit of this card.

        • faceValue

          int faceValue
          The face value of this card. 1 for ace, 2 for deuce, etc, all the way up to 13 for a king.

        • faceShowing

          boolean faceShowing
          Stores whether the card is flipped or not. True if the cards image is back.png, false otherwise.

          Button to replace the cards in a hand..

        • betPrint

          javax.swing.JLabel betPrint
          Label displaying the amount of cash the player has.

        • onTable

          javax.swing.JLabel onTable
          Label displaying the amount of the bet on the table for the user.

        • bet

          int bet
          Integer value for the Player's bet.

        • cBet

          int cBet
          Integer value for the computer's bet.

        • hand1

          Card[] hand1
          Array of Cards that is the Player's hand.

        • comp

          Card[] comp
          Array of Cards that is the Computer's hand.

        • replace

          java.util.ArrayList<E> replace
          ArrayList of Cards that are going to be replaced from hand1
          See Also:
          FiveCard.hand1

        • indexes

          java.util.ArrayList<E> indexes
          ArrayList of Integers that stores the indexes of the Cards to be replaced from hand1
          See Also:
          FiveCard.hand1

        • deck

          Deck deck
          Deck for the Game.

        • notReplaced

          boolean notReplaced
          Represents whether or not the user has replaced their cards for the current hand yet

        • justBet

          int justBet
          Represents whether or not the user has the ability to bet or not

    • Class TexasHoldEm extends java.awt.Container implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • SMALL_BLIND

          int SMALL_BLIND
          Value of small blind

        • BACKGROUND

          javax.swing.JLabel BACKGROUND
          Background image

        • takeTurn

          javax.swing.JButton takeTurn

        • monies

          int[] monies
          An array holding the amount of money each player has. The user's money is monies[0]. The computer's monies (monies[1], monies[2], monies[3]) are all initialized each hand to Integer.MAX_VALUE to prevent them running out of money during a hand.

        • hand

          Card[][] hand
          2D Array of cards to hold each players hand

        • river

          java.util.ArrayList<E> river
          The river. Cards will be added to this in deal().

        • bets

          java.util.ArrayList<E> bets
          The bets of each player, flushed to the pot after the round.

        • betPrint

          javax.swing.JLabel betPrint
          Label displaying how much money you have

        • onTable

          javax.swing.JLabel onTable
          Label displaying how much money you have on the table (wagered)

        • pot

          int pot
          The pot: the total wagered money to be won at the end of the hand

        • betIndex

          int betIndex
          The location of the player who is currently betting

        • haveBet

          int haveBet
          The number of players who have bet; used to ensure that every round of betting provides each player a chance to bet a minimum of once

        • deck

          Deck deck
          The deck used in this game of Texas Hold Em

        • moveOn

          javax.swing.JButton moveOn
          The button that will either make the user call, or allow them to check, depending on which is legal

        • hasFolded

          boolean hasFolded
          Used to prevent computers from continuing playing after user has folded
